column4: i just got me a 15" and a 19" lcd and with both ubuntu/kununtu, when i reboot as soon as i pass grub the monitors go out of range until i get to gdm. anyone why? i change the horiz/vert sync and everything in xorg. i not really sure what the deal is

hmm. well not really sure that would help because then my graphics aren't going to be all that great. because i have the nvidia driver installed =(
